short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: calculator Extension. Developed by String Consultants

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A machine that provides arithmetic capabilities. The most basic calculators add, subtract, multiply and divide. More advanced devices handle sines, cosines and other trigonometric functions.
